mapper.update: UPDATE member SET last_login = SYSDATE, failure_cnt = 0 WHERE userId=#{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT userIdx, userId, name, pwd, zip, addr1, addr2, email, tel, reg_date, point, clevel, slevel FROM member m WHERE m.userId = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member(userIdx, userId, pwd, name, zip, addr1, addr2, email, tel, reg_date, point, clevel, slevel) VALUES (#{userIdx}, #{userId}, #{pwd}, #{name}, #{zip}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{email}, #{tel}, SYSDATE, 0,0,0)
INSERT INTO qualification (qualificationNum, qualificationName, userId) VALUES (qualification_seq.NEXTVAL, '일반 회원', #{userId})
